content.raw:
`grunt test` spits out a warning and an error


```
#!javascript


WARN [watcher]: Pattern "/home/ian/depot/cloudsimk/public/js/controllers/users.js" does not match any file.
INFO [PhantomJS 1.9.7 (Linux)]: Connected on socket 88o2O5cg3e9WP5PGLUjF
PhantomJS 1.9.7 (Linux) CloudSim controllers UsersController should expose some global scope FAILED
	Error: [ng:areq] Argument 'UsersController' is not a function, got undefined
	http://errors.angularjs.org/1.2.15/ng/areq?p0=UsersController&p1=not%20a%20function%2C%20got%20undefined
	    at assertArg (/home/ian/depot/cloudsimk/public/lib/angular/angular.js:1443)
	    at assertArgFn (/home/ian/depot/cloudsimk/public/lib/angular/angular.js:1454)
	    at /home/ian/depot/cloudsimk/public/lib/angular/angular.js:6919
	    at /home/ian/depot/cloudsimk/test/karma/unit/controllers/users.spec.js:15
	    at invoke (/home/ian/depot/cloudsimk/public/lib/angular/angular.js:3805)
	    at workFn (/home/ian/depot/cloudsimk/public/lib/angular-mocks/angular-mocks.js:2143)
	undefined
	Expected undefined to be truthy.

```

looks like we'll have to update [karma.conf.js](#!/osrf/cloudsimk/src/b1a970ad21ab5272772fec2c2e365b9a53b7c203/test/karma/karma.conf.js?at=default) to reference the new `public/js/controllers/admin.js` file, or maybe I am doing something wrong
